title: Prevent unlock with fingerprint/tap on screen, immediately after manually locking with button
content:
One thing that really frustrating me is that when I press the power button to lock the device, there's very good chance that it will unlock itself when I'm putting it my pocket or something.

I use the tap to unlock screen feature, and of course also the fingeprint. So if I press the power button to lock it, if I accidentally touch the screen, or fingeprint sensor while placing the phone in my pocket or table etc, the phone wil unlock again.

To me this feels like a bad design - those unlocking features should be disabled for at least 10 seconds after manually locking with the button.
